Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
divs: sighting detailswhen i first seen this thing it was like a chinese lantern and thats what i thought it was until the light on it went out and a red led\strobe light flashed on and off for a couple of minutes the light then came back on and moved in a zigzag style motion and seemed to move towards a plane that was in a higher orbit before the light came back on and it moved off in the direction of barlborough\m1 services shortly followed by the police helicopter from the killamarsh direction from our house which then tracked up and down barlborough for about 10 minutes before disappearing in the sheffield\rotherham direction or m1 northbound also seen some shooting stars but seems we are in the middle of a metoer shower at the moment no sound from the object and it was'nt very high in the night sky. other aircaft visible with the lights that flash from an aircraft ie green red and white strobe lights no cloud coverage stars easily observed my girlfriend and her son also observed this object with me
Summary: ufo lights went out red strobing light zigzag intelligent movement
trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Sheffield
There were no other sightings in Sheffield on or around February 2nd 2010
